articles.author: Sandee LaMotte
articles.title: 1 in 10 Americans over 65 have dementia, study finds - CNN
articles.description: Rates of dementia and mild cognitive decline rise every five years after 65, a new study found. African Americans were more likely to have dementia, and Hispanics were more likely to suffer from mild cognitive impairment.
articles.content: One in 10 Americans over 65 had dementia, while 22% experienced mild cognitive impairment, the earliest stage of the slow slide into senility, according to a new study conducted between 2016 and 2017… [+7123 chars]

articles.author: Ray Sanchez
articles.title: 'Nation's Report Card' shows new evidence of Covid-19's devastating impact on US children's education - CNN
articles.description: Fourth- and eighth-graders fell behind in math and reading in most US states during the pandemic, according to a national educational assessment, renewing concerns about the devastating impact of the health crisis on America's educational system.
articles.content: Fourth- and eighth-graders fell behind in reading and had the largest ever decline in math, according to a national educational assessment showing the devastating effect of the Covid-19 pandemic on A… [+5172 chars]
